description: Try our easy to follow Prawns with Garlic Mayonnaise recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Prawn dishes,Prawn,Tree nut free,Quick & easy lunch,Sesame free,Easter,Summer,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Prawns with Garlic Mayonnaise Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place egg yolks and garlic into a small food processor. Process for 30 seconds or until combined. With processor motor running, add 1 teaspoon oil. Continue to add oil, 1 teaspoon at a time, until mixture forms a thick creamy mayonnaise. Add remaining oil and process until smooth and thick.
Add lemon juice and process until combined. Season with salt and white pepper. Add a little warm water, a teaspoon at a time, for a thinner mayonnaise.
Cook prawns as per packet instructions. Drain and serve with a dollop of garlic mayonnaise.
